## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Why is it needed?

**Example:**
> As a developer working with large monorepos, I need to analyze specific subdirectories to avoid overwhelming the AI with too many files.

## Proposed Solution

How do you envision this working?

**Example:**
```typescript
// Add workspace folder selection in UI
// Allow configuring max files in settings
```

## Mockups/Examples

If applicable, add mockups, diagrams, or examples of how this feature would look/work.

## Alternatives Considered

What other solutions have you thought about?

## Priority

How important is this feature to you?

- [ ] **Critical** - Blocks my workflow
- [ ] **High** - Would significantly improve my experience
- [ ] **Medium** - Nice to have
- [ ] **Low** - Minor improvement

Any other information, links to similar features in other tools, etc.
